author: Kimberly Kindy, Emma Brown and Dalton Bennett, The Washington Post
title: UPDATE: Thousands of inmates released as jails face coronavirus threat...
description: Amid fears that the coronavirus will carve a deadly path through prisons and jails, counties and states are releasing thousands of inmates - New Jersey alone began freeing hundreds of people this week - and the federal prison system is coming under intense pr…
